profile_positions.description:
Infra Automation: 
Automating multiple levels of infrastructure deployments using Terraform: azure/kubernetes/apps configuration/installation.  
Automatic secrets rotation  

Infra networking/security:

Multizone traffic optimizations for Kuberentes

Observability:
Fully embracing OpenTelemetry for observability subsystems. 
Building product consumption tracking system based on top of OpenTelemetry metrics. 
PromQL ins and outs!

Multi-region Application deployment automation. 
Time to marked in multiple regions - 2 hours! With full cycle of automated testing(Unit/Api/Integration/E2E).

OAuth2 multitenant applications publisher verification: Azure Active Directory - MPN, Google.

Alert-manager + slack/MS Teams to alert on Metrics and Logs

KEDA to auto-scale workloads based on various metrics from Prometheus

profile_positions.description:
Automating infrastructure creation and updates using Terraform. 
Configuration split into few modules each creating bit of infrastructure. 
Using multiple end configurations - Dev and Prod.
Using multiple workspaces for Prod and Staging.
From zero to hero automation - from nothing to a running service(see App description bellow)

Deploying Azure resources (azurerm provider), deploying/configuring kubernetes resources using Helm, kubernetes and kubernetes-experimental Terraform providers.

Autoscaling various parts of deployments using Horizontal Pod autoscaler and AKS cluster autoscaler.
Using various metrics for scaling, including external metrics
profile_positions.title: Architect/DevOps engineer

profile_positions.description:
Continue improving the application:
Hardening security aspects of the deployment: 
     Implementing Web application firewall with full set of OWASP 3.2 rules (Opensource nginx + modsecurity) + Azure Log Analytics for logging and alerting for ALL environments (Automatically created branch environments as well!)
     Automatic pen-testing the app using OWASP ZAP proxy.
     Code security testing using SonarQube
profile_positions.title: Architect/Lead developer

profile_positions.description:
Designing and implementing distributed  multi-tenant,  multi-region application.
Implementing all required infrastructure  
App: SQL store + Orleans middle tier + .net core 3.1 mvc API + Angular 9 
CI/CD: 
   For all feature branches, staging, prod. (push+refresh - push to git refresh your browser windows) 
   Using Azure DevOps  to orchestrate CI/CD and run tests. (Powershell/bash). Running and publishing results and code coverage of .net unit, .net integration, angular unit and e2e tests. Automatically making screenshots for failed e2e tests.
   Using Azure Dev spaces to optimize developer efficiency.
   Run-time: Azure Kubernetes service (AKS). Helm 3.0 to deploy. Using namespace security separation on both Dev, Staging and Prod. 
   Ultra cost efficient deployment: utilizing a single Dev AKS cluster for entire DEV process: Running Azure devops build agents for build, test and deployment orchestration, SQL server Dev as database and multiple app deployments( one per git feature/bug/release branch managed by Azure Devops pipeline in automatic way). Scaling the infra down automatically based on demand, without affecting the app functionality. 
  Using Azure Managed SQL instance for Staging/Prod.
  Azure Application Insights for Front and and Back end, Cost efficient setup, customizable filtering. Dynamically changeable
  AKS monitoring plugin for AKS infra monitoring and alerting. Different settings for dev and prod. 
  Auto alerting on data from AppInsights and LogAnalytics.   
  
Release management: 
After branching for release roll-out, Dev build testing is done. Next the build is automatically deployed to Staging on requested regions with a production DB restored. E2E test are executed on Staging. If everything is green last confirmation is received for PO and release is rolled out to Prod without affecting application users.
If AppInsights or AKS telemetry signals increased rate of errors, roll back to previous deployment is possible.
profile_positions.title: Architect/Lead Developer

Azure WAF configuration, troubleshooting.

Adding SSO support for enterprise customers with Azure Active Directory.
profile_positions.title: Architect/Lead Developer

profile_positions.description:
Focusing more on technical side of the story.
Implementing graduate migration of the SaaS offering backbone to Microsoft Azure.

SSO options for Client AAD tenants. 
Multi-Layered security model. Ability to use OpenIdConnect and Bearer tokens.
Developing Public Web API using Azure API management service 
Azure Application gateway with WAF in depth management and troubleshooting. 
Implementing monitoring and push notification for multiple Azure resources( appinsights, log analytics).
Containerization(docker) of existing services with COM dependencies.
Secure infrastructure using gMSA and system managed service accounts. Using azure resource identities to implement secure access to Azure resources.
CI/CD extending Jenkins/azure Dev ops infrastructure and amount and types of tests including unit/web unit/smoke/integration tests.
Jenkins Multibranch pipeline implementation.
Interviewing candidates
profile_positions.title: Software and Solutions Architect

profile_positions.description:
Role with a mix of responsibilities: Architecture & Engineering, R&D management, Product ownership, Operations/implementations mentoring.

Managing a group of 20+ people.
 
Leading the migration to DevOps and implementing CD.

Sales support with Deep dive on site demonstrations and explanations to most important prospects. One of such resulted in the biggest deal in the history of the company.
 
Managing the biggest implementation of the product successfully.

Product release briefings and trainings.

Interviewing and on-boarding Software developers and QA engineers. 
Several hiring campaigns. Visiting Eastern Europe for face to face interviews.
Refining the team.

Leading high tech evolution utilizing various Machine Learning technics on Big data.
Continue enriching the feature set of the Product suit its performance, scalability and reliability.
Vastly improved automated testing infrastructure.
Unit tests are clustered into different groups and executed on a set of computers based on test external dependencies.
Different sorts of smoke-tests/integration tests automatically executed on different clusters of computers.
With heavily growing amount of tests integration time was reduced to the minimum without sacrificing quality by running only the tests that should be run for each integration cycle with a granularity of a source file change.
 
Reliability of the product improved vastly after allowing home grown Chaos Monkeys into the clusters while the tests are running.
profile_positions.title: R&D Manager/Architect

profile_positions.description:

Continue improving Distributed Processing system - feature set, performance and scalability
Teaching company`s staff to use this configurable and powerful solution. 
Giving training sessions on system`s components, advanced configuration and extensibility. 

Working closely with operations to improve the system. 
Developed application that allows gathering of structural information from people in organization using fully customizable email templates and questioners.

Developed application to Review results of Processing. 
Features:
•	Near native representation of the document in your browser, no client install
•	Search on tags, metadata and content of documents.  
•	Automatic batches assign to reviewers. 
•	Tag/Bulk tag. 
•	Sampling. 
•	Redact documents. 
•	Produce a subset of the documents.
SQL server DB back end, Silverlight UI.

 Improving Production module.

Received best employees of the company award

Key achievements:
Complete application suite that takes unstructured mess as input, makes every piece of information (does not matter how deeply hidden) searchable. 
Close cooperation with operations

Good team, good progress.

Working with DB development team on new applications portfolio using Silverlight and WPF technologies
Providing advices on best strategies an approaches. Implementing POCs to illustrate the core technical aspects of advice given
Member of Architects board in Deutsche Bank.

Have found time to improve working conditions of multiple people at DB ODC.
People in DB ODC in Kiev had no access to DB DNS servers. But there was a way to resolve addresses using a web page. I have implemented local DNS server that would inject itself on developer computer and resolve unknown DB addresses and cache them locally. After running the tool you could navigate the DB network like from inside. Many people in DB ODC have used the tool.
